content: Join Cryptoleaks for the Best Market Signals and Analysis!Are you looking for the top signals on the web? Look no further! At Cryptoleaks, we provide you with the best signals from top traders in the scene. Everyone deserves to stay informed about market trends, and that's why we offer:- In-Depth Analysis: Our team provides comprehensive market analysis to help you make informed decisions.- Accurate Signals: Get real-time signals from the experts to stay ahead of the game.- Expert Advice: We're here to guide you through the crypto world.Don't miss out on the opportunity to be part of our community. Join Cryptoleaks today and stay in the know!Discord: discord.gg/cryptoleaks

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: And this is different from your previous topic how?https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5462712.msg62672422#msg62672422Of course, I'm going to ask the same question, if you have such reliable information from top traders why don't you make millions all by yourself and you're trying to sell $15 subscriptions? Even if somebody would take your numbers seriously you still have made less than a few BTC from them, why even bother when you're standing on a gold mine of "leaks"!

comments.author: BitcoinsGreat
comments.body: Quote from: aning97 on October 18, 2023, 07:10:58 AMIf you don't even know what it's about, because you evidently haven't even opened a chart in your life, please refrain from making strange and unsuitable comments.I am sorry but those who have opened the charts and know about trading, they will never buy your Crypto Leaks Service. Yes, you can only convince those who are newbie in trading and you can impress them by showing 100% , 200% returns screenshots and all those stuff in your discord group.Even if you claim, you will start a free service, it won't be free for much longer. As soon as you get a few signals hit, you will start demanding money from these innocent newbie traders. This is what happens in all the trading groups and this will happen in your trading leak group too.

comments.author: aning97
comments.body: I understand your point. The difference is that I don't claim to be a "GURU." For me, this consideration makes less sense. Many people earn and continue to earn, and they don't ask me but rather the members of the system.

comments.author: aning97
comments.body: Quote from: aning97 on October 18, 2023, 11:59:49 AMI understand your point. The difference is that I don't claim to be a "GURU." For me, this consideration makes less sense. Many people earn and continue to earn, and they don't ask me but rather the members of the system.I’m sure that your ELON COIN doesn’t generate wealth for people who believe they can become rich with it. I never promise a financial return or wealth. We study ICT concepts and also collect fees to follow a highly skilled trader inside the crypto market. I never claim to transform someone from being poor to rich. So, please refrain from making negative comments about my posts if no one understands the purpose of this server.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Just a heads-up to those who might not be aware. The crypto signals advertised are inaccurate, if not the whole thing is a scam. The OP of this thread decided to abandon another thread because he is trying to hide away the truth.Here is some food for thought.Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on August 19, 2023, 10:03:42 PMWhy don't you use the "leaked signals" to make your trading account bigger yourself if they are really accurate, instead of looking for $25 in forums?I mean, if the signals even have an 80% win rate, with good risk management strategy, you can turn $1000 into $300,000 in a few months without having to resell the signals for a mere $25.I can tell you why. The signals are simply fake.If the “accurate” signals can't work for him, then why is he selling them?

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP I am curious about your signal after reading replies and comments here. It is unfortunate that you would have these scores to settle before you think of going ahead because these accusations here I presume are somehow weighty which would warrant members to scrutinise you before thinking of patronising your services. Nevertheless, I am not sure if you truly are a trader to give out signal or you belong to a telegram community where signals are shared then you go to your community d ask them to pay for signals and you share them wrong signals for trading  or how do you do that?

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on January 26, 2024, 04:53:20 PMIf the “accurate” signals can't work for him, then why is he selling them?There are few people that i know who never did the business at Amazon or dropshipping, but they are making money by making and selling  the courses on these things. Similarly there are people who do not know the ABC of trading but they are making money by running a crypto signal group, providing useless signals to the masses and earning money from the subscription fee. By the way, making and giving signals is the easiest in the crypto world where you can randomly give 5-10 signals every day and OfCourse then you can create a noise that your signals getting hit as one or two will get hit out of so many.   Also copying free signals from telegram and twitter and posting them as your own in the crypto channels is another way how these scammers make money.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: virasog on January 27, 2024, 03:22:40 AMThere are few people that i know who never did the business at Amazon or dropshipping, but they are making money by making and selling  the courses on these things. Similarly there are people who do not know the ABC of trading but they are making money by running a crypto signal group, providing useless signals to the masses and earning money from the subscription fee. The same guys that sell books on how to win the lottery, instead of making 10 millions a month by winning those they try to make $10 000 a year by selling a few books, wonder why? Probably because all those are pure bs and writing is easier than practice?  Take Kiyosaki for example, renown author, quoted every day but in real life he has gone bankruptcy after bankruptcy, lawsuit after lawsuit, he has never had a profitable business in his life but he's good at writing fantasy novels, cause those have nothing real in them.Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on January 26, 2024, 04:53:20 PMIf the “accurate” signals can't work for him, then why is he selling them?Ask this the guy who just yesterday was selling a 101% formula to win millions in a casino for $200.
